clusters.title: Americans’ junk-filled garages are hurting EV adoption, study says
clusters.neutral_headline: Study Suggests Garage Clutter Impacts Electric Vehicle Adoption

items.title: Americans’ junk-filled garages are hurting EV adoption, study says

ai_summary: A new study indicates cluttered garages hinder electric vehicle adoption in America.
Many Americans lack space to store both gasoline cars and electric vehicles.
This lack of space is a significant barrier to electric vehicle adoption.
The study highlights the need for solutions to address garage storage issues.
Addressing storage problems could accelerate the transition to electric vehicles.

clusters.title: Neolithic people took gruesome trophies from invading tribes

items.title: Neolithic people took gruesome trophies from invading tribes

ai_summary: Archaeological research reveals Neolithic people took trophies from invaders.
These trophies included skulls and other body parts from enemies.
The practice suggests violent conflict and territorial disputes.
Findings provide insight into early human warfare and social dynamics.
The study examined remains from a site in Germany.
